power.title: Infused Familiar
power.fluff: You infuse your familiar with arcane energy, granting it the ability to render emergency aid

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have the Arcane Familiar feat, and the Magical Infusion class feature

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: Your familiar must be in its active state

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You use one of the powers granted by your Magical Infusion class feature, but your familiar is the origin square for the effect.
